subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Kara Goucher said she would run in the New York City Marathon on Nov. 2, her first marathon, and hopes to become the first American woman since 1992 to reach the podium.
snippet: Kara Goucher said she would run in the New York City Marathon on Nov. 2, her first marathon, and hopes to become the first American woman since 1992 to reach the podium.
